name: df-dprd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cdprd, cmpo(s0, s1, cgrp, cab(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), cdm(cv(s2)), cfv(csubg, cv(s0))), wral(s3, cdm(cv(s2)), wa(wral(s4, cdif(cdm(cv(s2)), csn(cv(s3))), wss(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))))), wceq(cin(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(cv(s2), cdif(cdm(cv(s2)), csn(cv(s3))))))), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))))))), crn(cmpt(s5, crab(s2, cixp(s3, cdm(cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), co(cv(s0), cgsu, cv(s5))))))
comment: Define the internal direct product of a family of subgroups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
